amity-online-university.eligibility_documents: Valid certificate of disability as per government norms.
Minimum 2 years of service in the defence forces with a valid Identity Card Number.
For alumni of Amity University's undergraduate or postgraduate courses.
Academic excellence with a minimum of 85% aggregate in the previous qualification.
State, national, or international-level sportspersons with a valid affiliation from the respective sports federation.
